scripts.dev:preview: npm run build:dev && npm run serve:preview
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build:dev && concurrently "npm run watch:html" "npm run serve:preview"
scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run process-html && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:staging: NODE_ENV=staging npm run process-html && npm run optimize:staging
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run process-html && npm run optimize:prod
scripts.optimize:staging: npm run copy:assets && npm run optimize:images
scripts.optimize:prod: npm run copy:assets && npm run optimize:images && npm run minify:html
